summary: App UI: character/name picker used in post/comment composer needs a mobile-friendly, scrollable selector so users can browse names without the list overflowing the screen.
known_issues: On mobile, the name/character dropdown list overflows the screen and does not respond to finger scrolling, preventing users from viewing all names.

existing_features.title: Make the author/name selection dropdowns reliably scrollable on mobile (vertical up/down) so the list does not overflow the viewport and finger scrolling works to reach all names.
Add a clear scroll affordance to the open name dropdown list by showing a side scroll indicator/arrow controls when the list is scrollable.

Ensure the mobile scrolling fix applies to all existing user/character author selection Select components used when creating content (post/comment/story/message) so no screen still uses a non-scrollable dropdown variant.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix mobile name/character picker so the dropdown list scrolls vertically (up/down) and add a side scroll indicator/arrow to make scrolling affordance clear.
